reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
SETUP
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Pub Ads' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Pub Ads' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'Pub Ads' check box is checked.
Enter 'Pixelman' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Pixelman' to be visible in module list.
Enter 'MPS' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'MPS' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'MPS' check box is checked.
Enter 'DART' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'DART' to be visible in module list.
Enter 'Doubleclick for Publishers' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Doubleclick for Publishers' to be visible in module list.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Click the 'MPS Configuration' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPS Configuration dialog'.
Enter 'mps.io' in the 'MPS Host' text box.
Click the 'Document Write' radio button.
Enter 'pub7-development' in the 'Site Instance Override' text box.
Clear all 'Name' text box values.
Clear all 'Value' text box values.
Uncheck all 'JSON' check boxes.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 2 - N/A
STEP 3 - N/A
STEP 4
Mouse over the 'Reports' menu link.
Click the 'Status report' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Status report dialog'.
Verify the text 'Ad Tag Style' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'MPS' is present on the page.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 5
Verify the mps call parameter '"site":"pub7-development"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"title":"Welcome to' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"path":"\/"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"is_content":0' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"type":"other"' is present in the page source.
STEP 6
Click the 'People' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'People dialog'.
Verify that no MPS calls were made on the page.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 7
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/kfkjdjdkjdjldkjj'.
Verify the mps call parameter '"site":"pub7-development"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"path":"ERROR/404"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"content_id":"ERROR"' is present in the page source.
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
STEP 8 - N/A - COVERED IN SETUP
STEP 9
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Movie' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter '8f30504d72744e2' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
Click the 'Additional Information' link.
Select the 'Syndicated' from the 'Movie Type' drop down list.
Select the 'G' from the 'Rating' drop down list.
Select the 'Action' from the 'Primary Genre' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Movie 8f30504d72744e2 has been created.' is present.
Note the node number for the content item.
STEP 10 through STEP 19
Verify the mps call parameter '"site":"pub7-development"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"title":"8f30504d72744e2"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"path":"\/node\/4536"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"content_id":"node4536"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"is_content":1' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"type":"movie"' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"cag":{"genre":"Action","movie-rating":"G","movie-types":"Syndicated"}' is present in the page source.
Verify the mps call parameter '"pubdate":' is present in the page source.
STEP 20
Verify 'a3VtdWQ9MQ==' is present in page source.
STEP 21
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Media Gallery' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
Enter 'c47cd02c78724cf' in the 'Title' text box.
Click the 'Media Items Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Click the 'View Library' button.
Enter 'HanSolo' in the 'File name' text box.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Verify the media thumbnail image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the the img is loaded and visible.
Click media thumbnail image number 1
Click on the 'Submit' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
Verify the img source of the Media Item contains 'HanSolo'.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Media Gallery c47cd02c78724cf has been created.' is present.
Note the node number for the content item.
Get the file id of image number 1.
STEP 22
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com/node/4541/5796'.
STEP 28
Verify 'typeof(mps.writeFooter)' is present in page source.
STEP 29
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'MPS Blocks' menu link.
Click the 'Add' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add a new MPS block dialog'.
Enter '5fcf18ed3ef8437' in the 'Block Name' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of '5fcf18ed3ef8437 has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 30
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name '5fcf18ed3ef8437 (MPS)' from the 'Header' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Blocks' button.
Verify success message of 'The block settings have been updated.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 31
Verify 'mps.getAd('5fcf18ed3ef8437')' is present in page source.
STEP 32 - N/A
CLEANUP
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name '5fcf18ed3ef8437 (MPS)' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Blocks' button.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
